Intro

I'm a visual designer with a focus on interactive design, UI/UX, and digital storytelling. I've been on the Creative Team at Everlane since 2015, where I've helped develop and evolve our launch landing pages, digital products, and interactive campaigns. I'm currently based in San Francisco, CA.

Background

Everlane

Graphic Designer

Concept, design and execute campaigns and interactive experiences around Everlane's marquee product and brand stories.

Madewell

Web Designer

Concepted and designed editorial features, styling stories, and brand updates for Madewell.com.

Kaufmann-Mercantile

Graphic Designer

Provided creative development and production design for email campaigns, paid marketing channels and the KM store. Assisted in UX strategy and design of Kaufmann-Mercantile.com.

PVH

Creative Intern

Assisted in social media strategies and contests, managed e-commerce accounts, and communicated with wholesalers for the PVH Heritage Brand network.

Bard College

B.A. in Languages & Literature

Editor in Chief of Bard Free Press. Directed content, production, and 45+ staff for Bard College’s only student newspaper. Designed and implemented the newspaper’s initial online presence in 2012. Lead graphic designer for both print and online content. Awarded First Place in Design by the New York Press Association (2014), and Best in Show by the ACP (2013)
